tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My 5-year-old child had a high fever for over five days. I had consulted two doctors before seeing Doctor Lini, but they couldn't diagnose the issue and kept recommending Crocin to control the fever. Upon examining my child's face, eyes, and ears, Doctor Lini confidently identified an acute bacterial infection and immediately started IV antibiotics without waiting for any test results. Her confidence was remarkable, and my child began recovering the next day. The test results later confirmed typhoid. Doctor Lini's treatment, reassuring smile, and comforting manner with parents are exceptional. I highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: This is the fourth time I'm visiting this doctor. She was the same every time. She starts the conversation with a beautiful smile, listens and explains the issue in detail in a way we understand. Doens't recommend the medicines unnecessarily. Even though I stay a bit far, I feel like going to only this Doctor.  More than half of the problems go after talking to her and understanding the problem with solutions. And remaining problems also get resolved in just a few days. I love the way she treats, she doesn't jump to medicines etc etc, she gives enough time to explain multiple issues and gives clear answers. Thank you Doctor üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My baby was having issue in breathing while sleeping and colic issue. First time, the consultation was fine. Two days after first visit, we went to again as the baby issues are not going away. We called rainbow hospital and tried to book the appointment. But no appointment was available and as the visit was a follow up visit, they told me to go there as walk-in. When I showed up there in the hospital, first the receptionist told me that she doesn‚Äôt want to see any walk-in patient. After telling them that we are here because we were suggested to come as walk-in by the Rainbow appointment booking assistant only, they took our file. Then during the conversation with the doctor, the main thing happened. We get to know the actual colour of this doctor, she was very angry and started shouting on another assistant on a very simple printer issue. We were clearly able to understand that she is actually shouting on us and then prescribed few *********** medicine. She gave acid reflux medicine which was not the issue for the baby and didn‚Äôt prescribed colic issue medicine. 
Finally we visited another doctor *** *** ********* *** ***** ***** ******** *** **** *** ******* ****
I won‚Äôt be suggesting this doctor to anyone. She gave the WhatsApp number but never replied or cared about any messages. *** ********* **** ********** ******* *** ****** ** ********* *********

While checking the baby , she is extremely careful nt to make him/her irritate. Explains the medication . Very much reachable on phone. Very down to earth.

No point of taking appointment for a particular time. It is always first come first serve. Plus the queue before was already huge (may be they call more than what they can serve), so had to wait for more than 80 mins

She‚Äôs been my child‚Äôs doctor for the past 4 years. She is up to date with all major health organisations guidelines and is completely breastfeeding friendly, does not advocate for force feeding etc., she was exactly what o was looking for in a doctor.
